meanings.sent1: I picked a fuji apple from the tree.
meanings.sent2: The fuji apple was crisp and sweet.
meanings.sent3: Why did the fuji apple go to school? To get a little 'core' education!
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a freshly picked fuji apple.
meanings.sent5: The fuji apple's red skin gleamed in the sunlight.

meanings.sent1: Mount Fuji is a famous Japanese peak.
meanings.sent2: Tourists flock to see the majestic Mount Fuji.
meanings.sent3: Why did the hiker bring a ladder to Mount Fuji? In case they wanted to 'peak' at the view from the top!
meanings.sent4: The shadow of Mount Fuji loomed over the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The snow-capped peak of Mount Fuji stood tall against the blue sky.

meanings.sent1: She captured the moment with her fuji camera.
meanings.sent2: The fuji camera produced high-quality images.
meanings.sent3: Why did the photographer bring a fuji camera to the party? To 'shoot' some memories!
meanings.sent4: His eyes were like lenses of a fuji camera, capturing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The sleek design of the fuji camera made it easy to carry around.
